name: Busy Beaver, 5 states
description: Discovered in 1989, published 1990. Halts after 47,176,870 steps on blank tape.
author: Heiner Marxen & Jürgen Buntrock
paper: Heiner Marxen, Jürgen Buntrock, Attacking the Busy Beaver 5, Bulletin of the EATCS, Number 40, February 1990, pp. 247-251, [ISSN 0252-9742]
